    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
    Core game board API used by the controller and GUI.
    BoardRenderer
    Handles all rendering logic for the game board including background, falling brick, ghost piece, and previews.
    Brick
     
    BrickGenerator
    Provides bricks for the game.
    BrickMovementHandler
    Handles brick movement logic including validation and position updates.
    BrickRotator
    Handles rotation logic for Tetris bricks.
    ClearRow
    Represents the result of clearing lines from the board.
    CollisionDetector
    Handles collision detection for brick placement on the board.
    ColorManager
    Manages color and styling for game elements.
    DownData
     
    EventSource
     
    EventType
     
    GameConfig
    Immutable configuration for a given GameMode.
    GameController
    Connects the board (game logic) with the JavaFX GUI.
    GameMode
    High-level game modes available from the main menu.
    GameOverPanel
    Game over / result panel shown on top of the board.
    GameSettings
    Manages game settings including key bindings.
    GameState
     
    GhostPieceCalculator
    Calculates the landing position (ghost piece) for a brick if it were hard-dropped.
    GuiColorHelper
    Helper class for color and styling logic extracted from GuiController.
    GuiController
    JavaFX controller for the main game screen.
    GuiDangerHelper
    Helper class for danger zone logic extracted from GuiController.
    GuiHudHelper
    Helper class for HUD logic extracted from GuiController.
    GuiInputHandler
    Helper class for input handling logic extracted from GuiController.
    GuiLayoutHelper
    Helper class for layout calibration logic extracted from GuiController.
    GuiNavigationHandler
    Helper class for navigation logic extracted from GuiController.
    GuiNotificationHandler
    Helper class for notification logic extracted from GuiController.
    GuiRenderingHelper
    Helper class for rendering logic extracted from GuiController.
    GuiStateManager
    Helper class for game state management logic extracted from GuiController.
    GuiTimerHelper
    Helper class for timer logic extracted from GuiController.
    HudManager
    Manages HUD (Heads-Up Display) updates including score, level, lines, combo, timer, and progress.
    InputEventListener
     
    InputHandler
    Handles keyboard input for the game.
    LayoutCalibrator
    Handles board layout calibration to keep bricks perfectly aligned.
    Main
    Main application class for TetrisJFX.
    MainMenuController
    Controller for the main menu screen.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility class for matrix operations used in Tetris game logic.
    MoveEvent
     
    MusicPlayer
    Handles looping background music for the game screen.
    NextShapeInfo
     
    NotificationPanel
     
    RandomBrickGenerator
     
    RushModeHandler
    Handles Rush-40 mode-specific logic including line count tracking and milestones.
    Score
    Tracks score, level, total cleared lines and combo.
    SettingsController
    Controller for the settings page.
    SimpleBoard
    Core game model that holds board state, active brick, and score.
    SoundManager
    Central place for short sound effects (SFX).
    SurvivalModeHandler
    Handles Survival mode-specific logic including garbage row pressure and shields.
    TimerManager
    Manages game timers including auto-drop timer and HUD timer.
    ViewData
    Data class containing a snapshot of the current game view state.
